actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to authorize grants to States for the establishment of vision screening programs for public school students.
short_title: National Comprehensive Vision Care Act of 1979

summary.text: National Comprehensive Vision Care Act of 1979 - Authorizes the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to establish a program of grants to States for vision screening programs for public school students, including annual vision tests, followup services, and training of personnel.

titles.title: National Comprehensive Vision Care Act of 1979
A bill to authorize grants to States for the establishment of vision screening programs for public school students.
